@graph.rdfs:comment: A Verifiable Credential type describing Internationally Transferred Mitigation Outcomes (ITMOs) and related data under Article 6.2 of the Paris Agreement.
@graph.rdfs:label: ITMOCredential

@graph.rdfs:comment: High-level authorization information for an ITMO, including participating parties and references.
@graph.rdfs:label: authorizationInfo

@graph.rdfs:comment: Key parameters of the NDC, such as sectors, GHGs, and quantified emissions or removals.
@graph.rdfs:label: ndcQuantification

@graph.rdfs:comment: Accounting adjustments applied to avoid double counting in both transferring and acquiring Parties’ NDCs.
@graph.rdfs:label: correspondingAdjustments

@graph.rdfs:comment: Information ensuring ITMOs meet environmental integrity standards, including methodologies and references to official guidelines.
@graph.rdfs:label: environmentalIntegrity

@graph.rdfs:comment: A Party-issued reference or identifier granting authorization for ITMO generation or transfer.
@graph.rdfs:label: authorizationReference

@graph.rdfs:comment: Time frame during which cooperative approaches under Article 6.2 are active.
@graph.rdfs:label: cooperativeApproachDuration

@graph.rdfs:comment: Projected mitigation outcomes (e.g., in tonnes of CO2e) to be achieved in a specified period.
@graph.rdfs:label: expectedMitigationOutcomes

@graph.rdfs:comment: List of Party states participating in the ITMO cooperative arrangement.
@graph.rdfs:label: participatingParties

@graph.rdfs:comment: Entities authorized by Parties to engage in generating or trading ITMOs.
@graph.rdfs:label: authorizedEntities

@graph.rdfs:comment: Sectors included within the NDC’s scope for generating or accounting for ITMOs.
@graph.rdfs:label: ndcSectors

@graph.rdfs:comment: Emission sources from which ITMOs originate or to which reductions are attributed.
@graph.rdfs:label: ndcSources

@graph.rdfs:comment: Greenhouse gases covered under the NDC that are relevant for ITMO generation and tracking.
@graph.rdfs:label: ndcGHGs

@graph.rdfs:comment: Time periods or compliance years under the NDC to which these ITMOs apply.
@graph.rdfs:label: ndcTimePeriods

@graph.rdfs:comment: Reference emissions or removals level under the NDC used to measure progress or calculate ITMOs.
@graph.rdfs:label: ndcReferenceLevel

@graph.rdfs:comment: Target level of emissions or removals established by the NDC, crucial for defining ITMOs.
@graph.rdfs:label: ndcTargetLevel

@graph.rdfs:comment: Tonnes of CO2 equivalent relevant to the ITMO for verifying climate impact.
@graph.rdfs:label: ndcQuantificationTonnesCO2e

@graph.rdfs:comment: Boolean indicating if the NDC target is set for a single, specific year.
@graph.rdfs:label: singleYearNDC

@graph.rdfs:comment: Boolean indicating if the NDC target covers multiple years or a cumulative period.
@graph.rdfs:label: multiYearNDC

@graph.rdfs:comment: A sequence of emissions or removal values over time, showing progress toward the NDC target.
@graph.rdfs:label: emissionsTrajectory

@graph.rdfs:comment: Year-by-year accounting adjustments made to reflect ITMO transfers accurately in NDC balances.
@graph.rdfs:label: annualCorrespondingAdjustments

@graph.rdfs:comment: Average amount of ITMOs transferred per year, often relevant for single-year NDC targets.
@graph.rdfs:label: averageAnnualITMOs

@graph.rdfs:comment: Accumulated total of all corresponding adjustments over the NDC implementation period.
@graph.rdfs:label: cumulativeAdjustments

@graph.rdfs:comment: List of metrics or indicators (e.g., CO2e) ensuring ITMOs uphold environmental integrity requirements.
@graph.rdfs:label: environmentalIntegrityMetrics

@graph.rdfs:comment: Reference to the IPCC guidelines used to calculate emissions or removals (e.g., IPCC 2006).
@graph.rdfs:label: ipccMethodologiesReference

@graph.rdfs:comment: Any additional metrics besides GHGs that the participating Parties have agreed to track.
@graph.rdfs:label: otherNonGHGMetrics

@graph.rdfs:comment: Boolean indicating that the relevant Party is formally recognized under the Paris Agreement.
@graph.rdfs:label: partyStatusUnderParis

@graph.rdfs:comment: Boolean confirming the Party has a valid and active NDC submission.
@graph.rdfs:label: maintainedNDC

@graph.rdfs:comment: Registries, trackers, or systems used to monitor ITMO creation and transfers.
@graph.rdfs:label: trackingArrangements

@graph.rdfs:comment: Reference (URL or document) to the latest national GHG inventory report applicable to NDC calculations.
@graph.rdfs:label: mostRecentNationalInventory

@graph.rdfs:comment: Boolean indicating that the ITMOs actively support NDC objectives or benchmarks.
@graph.rdfs:label: contributionToNDCImplementation
